scripts.dev: start-process eleventy --serve; start-process npm run styles:watch; start-process npm run js:watch
scripts.build: npm run styles && npm run js && eleventy
scripts.styles: sass src/styles/main.scss src/styles/main.css && postcss src/styles/main.css -o dist/css/main.css
scripts.lint: echo 'Add linting commands here if needed'
